Support TCNJ

There are so many reasons to love TCNJ — and no better way to support the college than through the gift of scholarship. Your generosity will help TCNJ remain affordable and accessible by providing vital scholarships for today’s bright, curious minds and tomorrow’s leaders.

Invest in Scholarships

test Your investment in scholarships can help change the lives of TCNJ students.

Your generosity can have a huge impact on the success of future generations of TCNJ students while also enhancing TCNJ’s long-standing reputation of academic excellence. You’ll play a vital part in making TCNJ the top choice for entering college students across the state and region.

Giving Opportunities

Your donation can be a one-time gift of any size. You can also create — or expand upon — your own TCNJ legacy through a named or endowed scholarship.

School and Program Scholarships-

Scholarships can support students throughout the college or specifically target one or more academic departments or schools.

Invest in Scholarships

Endowed Scholarships+

Endowed scholarships enable the college to grow an investment over time and support future generations of students in perpetuity. Interested in learning more? Contact Laura Smith, leadership gift officer, at 609.771.2188 or laura.smith@tcnj.edu.

Contact us: tcnjfund@tcnj.edu or 609.771.2218 / 800.347.9621
